meaning_str.bing:
n. 训练；培训；锻炼
v. “train”的现在分词
网络. 培养；教育训练；训练模式

培养；教育训练；训练模式

培训；训练；锻炼；教育；练习；指导；准备工作；技能发展；体能训练；专业培养；素质提升
培训；指导；教育；培养…的能力；培养…的素质；锻炼；训练；进行…训练；（train的现在分词）

1.en: Ms McKamey says she may become a medical assistant, but does not know which degree to pursue or what money she might be given for training.
1.cn: McKamey女士说她希望成为一名医疗助理，但不知道需要什么学位或花多少钱去培训。

2.en: She was the only woman in the western world to have completed medical school training.
2.cn: 她是当时西方世界唯一完成医学院学业的女子。

3.en: We had a look at him and we didn't think it was too bad, so we were happy for him to report to Spain's training camp.
3.cn: 我们为他做了检查，发现情况并不严重，所以我们也很高兴他能返回西班牙国家队训练营报到。

2.en: Yeah, and you excelled during your service training. Excelled.
2.cn: 当然，你服役训练期间表现突出，出类拔萃。

3.en: Stage two of training is where you are most at risk.
3.cn: 第二阶段的训练是你最危险的时期。

4.en: And this is not an acceptable way to arrive at training.
4.cn: 而这个，来训练而已，用得着这样吗？

5.en: You may resume your duties. Begin training as a combat medic.
5.cn: 你可恢复原职责。作为军医开始训练。

6.en: I told you, we're adding new operators all the time. Could we concentrate on my training?
6.cn: 我们有加派接线员，专心训练，好吗？

7.en: Sorry, I'm Norm. Spellman. I went through avatar training with him.
7.cn: 抱歉，我是诺姆斯佩尔曼，我们一起参加的阿凡达项目训练。

8.en: Look, I don't see why I should have to miss out on the coaching training just because I'm a woman.
8.cn: 只因我是个女人，我就得错过教练训练？

9.en: At the end of each stage of training, the lowestranking initiates will be leaving us.
9.cn: 训练的每个阶段，排名倒数的新生们将会离开无畏派。

10.en: Your training begins first thing tomorrow morning. Sergeant Dap will show you to your quarters.
10.cn: 明天一早你的训练就开始了，戴普中士会带你去你的房间。

11.en: I've been training her. To be trained by the master. What have you learned? If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots.
11.cn: 我已经在训练他了。奥，你在接受大师的训练呢。那你学到了什么。恩，如果你想要去跳泥坑的话。你一定要穿上你的靴子。

12.en: I know you are eager to answer their calls, but your training is not yet complete.
12.cn: 我知道你们急於给予敌人猛烈的回击，但是你们的训练还没有全部完成。

13.en: Finally, we are conscripting new troops from the north. I have begun preparations for training.
13.cn: 我们终于从北方征募了新的军队，我已经着手准备训练他们了。

14.en: My final class because from now on your training will be in the hands of the Dragon Warrior.
14.cn: 之所以是最后一课，是因为接下来负责你们训练的将会是神龙大侠。

15.en: His name's Ngoc Minh Quan. He's armed and has U.S. Special Forces training. Use extreme caution.
15.cn: 姓名关玉明。他持有枪械，接受过美国特种部队训练要格外当心。

16.en: Come on. I got Matt to take the afternoon off from his training and Tyler to give the practice squad a break.
16.cn: 来嘛，我都让马特翘掉下午的训练，让泰勒给练习队放假。

17.en: I'm sure he was very convincing. All Russian diplomats go through FSB counter-intel training.
17.cn: 我相信他一定很令人信服，俄国所有外交官都经过了俄联邦安全局的反情报训练。

18.en: Really, your potty training journal? Yeah. And forgive my crude penmanship. I didn't start typing until I was six.
18.cn: 不是吧，你的如厕训练日志啊。是的，字迹难看，多多包涵，我六岁之后才开始打字。

19.en: So why the hell are you staying here? Is this training for when your looks run out? Oh, look. The kitchen is so cute!
19.cn: 所以你们为啥要来住这？想先为年华老去的未来做准备训练吗？你看，厨房好有爱！
